thread.title: Some Guy Yelled ‘Brendan Steele F*cked My Mom!’ At The Phoenix Open
thread.title_full: Some Guy Yelled ‘Brendan Steele F*cked My Mom!’ At The Phoenix Open

author: paulsacca
title: Some Guy Yelled ‘Brendan Steele F*cked My Mom!’ At The Phoenix Open
text:
Thanks for sharing https://t.co/uyIiO3bXbe pic.twitter.com/hutOQCiXVL 
— Deadspin (@Deadspin) February 4, 2017 

They don’t call it the Waste Management Phoenix Open for nothing. Brendan Steele is currently tied for third place at this weekend’s Phoenix Open , but that’s not important right now. What is important is Steele was acknowledged by a fan(?) or his son who yelled out “Steele fucked my mom” right after Brendan tee’d off. 
Such a more entertaining and intimate shout than “mashed potatoes.”
God bless this man for his originality and his dedication to drinking during PGA events. 
I imagine the heckler will not be shouting “get in the hole!” after Mr. Steele Your Mom tees off.
